metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7979 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Ghostscript before 9.21 might allow remote attackers to bypass the SAFER mode protection mechanism and consequently execute arbitrary code by leveraging type confusion in .initialize_dsc_parser.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7979` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ghostscript - 9.18~dfsg~0-0ubuntu2.2
ghostscript-x - 9.18~dfsg~0-0ubuntu2.2
libgs9 - 9.18~dfsg~0-0ubuntu2.2
libgs9-common - 9.18~dfsg~0-0ubuntu2.2
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> reproducer in ghostscript bug report

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '9.18~dfsg~0-0ubuntu2.2').
